name: 3D Colors
description:
A 3D landscape, but really, there is not so much to see.

I just wanted to show you my experiments with colors, shapes and raytracing.

controls :

move : zqsd/wasd 

jump : space

run : left shift

change keyboard type : ctrl + k

change fov : 1-2

move camera behind the player : 3-4

escape : escape
